Sequence Information.Structure Description: Analysis of surface hydrophobicity and haemolytic activity for a range of cyclotides indicates a correlation between them, with increasing hydrophobicity resulting in increased haemolytic activity.
Sequence Information.Function: Probably participates in a plant defense mechanism. Has hemolytic activity.
Sequence Information.PTM: This is a cyclic peptide which contains three disulfide bonds 5-19; 9-21; 14-27.

Literature.Title: Isolation and characterization of novel cyclotides from Viola hederaceae solution structure and anti-HIV activity of vhl-1, a leaf-specific expressed cyclotide.
Literature.Author: Chen B, Colgrave ML, Daly NL, Rosengren KJ, Gustafson KR, Craik DJ.

Literature.Title: Structure and activity of the leaf-specific cyclotide vhl-2.
Literature.Author: Daly NL, Chen B, Nguyencong P, Craik DJ.

Literature.Title: Isolation and characterization of novel cyclotides from Viola hederaceae: solution structure and anti-HIV activity of vhl-1, a leaf-specific expressed cyclotide.
Literature.Author: Gustafson K.R.,Rosengren K.J.,Daly N.L.,Colgrave M.L.,Chen B.
